ayah: يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ أَن تَنفُذُواْ مِنۡ أَقۡطَارِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنفُذُواْۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ
ayah_translit: yama'shara al-jini wal-insi ini is'tata'tum an tanfudhu min aqtari al-samawati wal-ardi fa-unfudhu la tanfudhuna illa bisul'tanin
ayah_english: O assembly (of) the jinn and the men! If you are able to pass beyond [of] (the) regions (of) the heavens and the earth then pass Not you (can) pass except by authority
